headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Altria Group (MO) After A Strong Multi‑Year Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Altria Group’s current share price still makes sense after a strong run, or if it is starting to look stretched, this article walks through what the numbers are actually saying about value. With the stock last closing at US$65.16 and returns of 3.2% over 7 days, 15.7% over 30 days, 13.7% year to date, 32.8% over 1 year, 77.9% over 3 years, and 120.9% over 5 years, many investors are asking whether the recent performance has already priced in the key...

headline: Altria CEO Succession Puts Dividend And Smoke Free Strategy In Focus
summary: Altria Group (NYSE:MO) has appointed Salvatore Mancuso to its Board of Directors. The company announced that Mancuso is expected to become CEO in May 2026. This planned leadership transition signals a future change at the top of one of the largest U.S. tobacco companies. For a company of Altria's size and influence in the U.S. tobacco and nicotine market, any change at the CEO level is a key event for investors to track. Altria operates in a sector that faces ongoing regulatory attention,...
